rows.label: qev040907_MSG0001
rows.name: Heya, Muimui. You still chasing that legendary sword?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0002
rows.name:
I keep telling you it's high time you dropped the
dreams and took on a legitimate job. I can—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0003
rows.name:
HA! Perhaps friend will stop nagging Muimui once
he sees...THIS![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0004
rows.name:
...Go on, other friend. Hand Sword of Legendaryness
over to preachy old man.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0005
rows.name: What in the... Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0006
rows.name:
It's a far cry from most of the Nopon stuff we see,
I'll give you that. Probably fetch a high price.
Reeeal high...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0007
rows.name: Where in the hell did you dig this up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev040907_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Walter that you found it in Sylvalum.

rows.label: qev040907_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev040907_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask why anyone would pay for such an item.

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0008
rows.name: Sylvalum?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0009
rows.name:
And just what were Nopon doing in a place that
dangerous with this thing? Who or what were they
fighting?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0010
rows.name:
This could unlock a whole new area of study. It might
be the key to all sorts of discoveries about Mira![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0011
rows.name: Don't look at me. I'm no scientist.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0012
rows.name:
But I'm told that research into Nopon and other
local types might offer clues to some of Mira's secrets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0013
rows.name:
A sword this ancient is bound to fill in some blanks for
our researchers, so I'm sure they'll be eager to see it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0014
rows.name:
Fantastic work, Muimui. That's the best Curator find
we've seen in weeks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0015
rows.name:
Right? RIGHT?! Friend is now welcome to shower
Muimui with respect and adulation and also money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0016
rows.name: All right, all right. Here you go, buddy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0017
rows.name:
This search has been rough on your little bro,
so you make sure to take care of him, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0018
rows.name: Oh-ho-ho-hoooooo! This will buy mega feast![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0019
rows.name:
Come on! Moimoi will have the party ready and
waiting at café by now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040907_MSG0020
rows.name:
Hurry up, friend! Muimui is liable to shrivel up and
blow away if dinner not served soon![ST:wait ]
